categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Korman Reyes was a Twi'lek male Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Around 3641 BBY, Korman was stationed on Belsavis where he tried to stop a group of Sith looters that stole ancient weapons of untold destruction and artifacts. He tasked a Republic spacer to disable the Imperial shuttle and recover the artifacts.
